hero.title: We make doing good fun and easy

crowdActionSection.title: Choose a CrowdAction and make a change today
crowdActionSection.description: On our app you can search for CrowdActions that spark your interest. Whether it's food, energy or transport: we can make our habits more sustainable at all fronts. Therefore, take a look and decide how you want to make impact!

commitmentOptionsSection.title: Your CrowdAction, your rules
commitmentOptionsSection.description: Have you decided which CrowdAction you'd like to take part in? The app shows which options you can choose from to take part in the CrowdAction, which we call commitments. You decide your pace by choosing your level of commitment.

impactSection.title: See how your actions make impact
impactSection.description: Thanks to the crowd, your individual actions are amplified. After the CrowdAction you can see the collective impact that was made!

socialSection.title: Find out who else is taking part in a CrowdAction
socialSection.description: Team up with friends, family, neighbours and colleagues to help each other in staying committed until the end of the CrowdAction!

useCollActionSection.title: Want to use CollAction for your project?
useCollActionSection.description: Do you have a sustainable initiative and would you like to reach a large crowd? Contact us
